name: Alex Rodriguez
bio: Passionate about climate justice and community organizing. Leading the charge to make Brooklyn Tech more sustainable.

name: Samantha Chen
bio: Environmental science enthusiast focused on urban ecology and green infrastructure in NYC communities.

name: Marcus Johnson
bio: Connecting with local organizations to amplify our impact and build coalitions for environmental justice.

name: Priya Patel
bio: Organizing rallies, workshops, and community events to raise awareness about climate change and environmental racism.

name: Jordan Lee
bio: Managing social media and communications to spread our message and engage with the wider environmental justice movement.

name: Maya Williams
bio: Keeping the club organized and ensuring everyone stays informed about our initiatives and upcoming actions.
